content.detailedDescription:
Upon returning home that evening, my wife **(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) described for me in detail an object she witnessed at approx. 10am et:

she was seated outside in our yard reading the paper.  sky was clear with few clouds.  she was facing south and something caught her eye about 45 deg off the horizon, just above a tree in our front yard.  the object, which she described as being like a meteor but bigger was moving on an approx. ne to sw track.  duration was about 2 sec.  color was described as brilliant white; no sound was heard. no trail was left behind. 

when asked to approximate object size at arms length **(wit's name deleted__ sgonzalez/cms) referenced an "o" shape made by thumb and index finger (approx. 1").  using arms length reference for distance travelled she held her arms approx 12" apart.

**(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) and i frequently sit outside at night seek out meteors during heavy shower activity (such as the perseids, which peak around her birthday) thus viewing them is a regular occurence for her.  she feels the motion of this object was not unusual in comparison to average night meteor observations but the evident diameter of the object was much larger.  for this reason (size) we felt it merited reporting.  

(prior to submission, i have checked cms data for entire us with no similar reports having been received for 9/8/10 as of 9/10/10, 4:50pm et)

***wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms.
content.summary: Was likely rare daylight meteor - *wit info deleted--sgonzalez/cms.

content.detailedDescription:
This is another example of the many strange and bizarre aerial objects that continuously fly thru the airspace of tennessee. this is just another image of the biologic bioform ufo's that has been continuously witnessed for a long time. the problem is that not enough people are recording these anomalous objects. however, with enough awareness of these sightings... maybe more people will spend more time admiring the natural wonders of the heavens... and less time looking downward! it is truly an amazing world! he who has eyes... let him see!

*(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms).
nashville
content.summary: Bizarre bioform ufo's over nashville, tennessee.

content.detailedDescription:
Either on october 14 or 15, 2008, i took these pictures.
i can not recall date but moon was full or near full that night.
 
my camera is a kodak easy share z650 with 10x zoom.
 
these pictures were taken in brick, nj at vets elementary school.
at the time my daughters were cheerleading during a pop warner
football game. in two of the pictures the ball of light, are lights
for the football field.
 
i took many pictures but only kept four. many pictures came out blurry like picture three.
 
at the time object looked like very very very very slow moving star,
but it appeared to be at a close distance. object first seen about 6:00 pm and object was still in area three hours later. went home from game about 8:00 pm. last looked at object about 9:00 pm from home. 
 
the camera i have can not combined night and sport functions. when
enlarging with my camera i could not really tell what was in picture?
 
my home is less than one mile from field and us naval base earl is
near our home (not sure of distance to base).
 
if you have any ideas what is in picture, could you let me know
one way or the other.
 
thank you for your time and possible interest.
content.summary: Object moved very very very slow horizontal across sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving westbound on 3rd ave. near cranmer park. there were no other cars on the road or the cross streets. just above the trees to the south/south-west i observed 3 very large bright spherical objects. 2 were white light and one was crimson. the 2 objects with white light seemed to cross in close proximity to each other with the crimson object centered slightly below them. these two objects moved in opposite directions (south east and south west) leaving the crimson object which dipped down in a v shaped path. when it completed the v shaped route it hovered in the air for about 60 seconds which is when i was able to really focus on it's characteristics. first, regardless of the direction of the object, it always remained a spherical object, as opposed to, for example, seeing the underside as it moves higher in the sky. there was no sound from any of the objects. it's movements were similar to a helicopter and i tried to dismiss it as a helicopter. but the object was way to large to be helicopter lights and i would have been able to see the body of the helicopter as it changed direction and height. 

i wish i could remember more specifics but i was too busy trying to convince myself i was seeing something normal. primarily i remember the point at which the crimson object was hovering and i could see it very clearly. i would describe it as spherical, with a beautiful crimson (deep red with black kind of running through it)color. it didn't shimmer, it looked more like plasma. around the circumference of the object looked almost like contained flames. it was one of the most beautiful colors i have ever seen.  it started moving down behind the trees and then it was gone. 

it also didn't project any light, it was completely self contained. it was pretty low in the sky, and closer than airliners pass overhead. all 3 of the objects had to be very large. 

i wasn't afraid while i was watching it, or after. oddly, when i recall the color of the crimson object, the most overwhelming feeling i have is how beautiful it was. i have never seen a color so beautiful.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Crimson sphere, 2 additional bright white sperical objects in close proximity.

content.detailedDescription:
Good evening,
 
attached are the pictures of the sighting my wife and i experienced in thousand oaks, ca on saturday august 21st, 2010 at 12:00 noon. i also have a short video.
 
please note: the picture with the blue colored sky is the original picture. the purple colored pictures were highlight by me to bring out he objects in the image. note, if you zoom in you will notice the other objects in the pics that resemble the larger object. i did not notice the other objects until i uploaded the pics and zoomed in. 
 
 
explanation of events:
 
note: this report includes two sightings exactly one week apart from each other in the same location within about 3-5 miles. have video and pics for the second sighting.
 
on saturday august 14th at around 5:30pm while floating on my back in the swimming pool looking straight up at the sky, my wife and i observed two bright ���star-like��� objects directly above us. i have always been interested and have observed/studied different aircraft and can usually make out what kind of aircraft in is in the sky.  one of the objects stayed stationary in the sky while the other was moving at a relatively slower speed (and very smoothly through the air) than a typical jet type passenger aircraft and heading south. the moving object seemed to disappear or i just lost visual sight of it after about 5 minutes. the object would speed up and slow down during the 5 minutes of observation. 
 
after losing sight of the first moving object, i looked back at the other object and it was still motionless in the sky. it appeared to be a star (which was strange considering stars are not usually visual during this time of day with the sun still shinning bright) because it was so still in the sky. after what seemed to be 2 minutes, this second object began to move south in the sky as well about the same speed as the first. this object would also speed up then slow down and make slight turns while ultimately keeping a flight path towards the south. after losing sight of this object because of trees, my wife and i went to sit in the spa. almost immediately after getting into the spa i noticed the object out of the left corner of my eye towards the east of me and was heading north. it seemed the object had made a complete 180 degree turn. the object was a little lower in the sky towards the horizon and was much bigger at this point. it seemed to be a white sphere that was shinning bright in the sky. after observing the object heading north for about 5 minutes, we again lost sight of it because of trees obstructing our view. i did not have a camera on me at the time so unfortunately no pictures were taken of these objects.
 
exactly one week later at 12:00 noon on saturday august 21, 2010 while walking out to my vehicle, i noticed the same type of bright white ���star-like��� ���orb��� object in the distance northern sky (altitude, size of the object, and distance unknown). i immediately ran into the house to grab my camera and told my wife to come out in order to confirm what i was seeing. she did confirm seeing the object in the sky and i was able to record a video of it as well as take some pictures. also, something strange happened when i uploaded the pics of the object to my computer. when i zoomed into the object, i noticed many more of these strange "white balls.��� these other objects were smaller, but i believe this was due to being further away.
 
after my experience observing these unidentified aerial objects and finding so many other videos and pictures of the same types of aerial objects online from all over the world, i am convinced this is something that is of extraterrestrial in origin. i am truly amazed at how many other pics and videos from around the world show the same type of objects that my wife and i have observed. it seems out of all the videos and pics i have seen thus far after researching this subject for the past couple of weeks, it seems this type of object shows up more than any other unidentified sightings. interesting considering just a few weeks ago my wife and i were skeptical of this kind of stuff. we are both highly educated and our brains/minds are ���pre-wired��� to think logically and in a scientific manner. after going through a process of elimination in our minds, we just can���t seem to find an answer as to what this was. we have researched this thoroughly and have analyzed pictures and videos of other aircraft, weather balloons, and other aerial explainable phenomenon. answers anyone?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,   Cylinder,   Egg,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Bright white objects caught on camera in thousand oaks, ca during daylight.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside for a smoke, and noticed a grouping of dim star-like objects that appeared to resemble, at that time, a condensed version of the big dipper. as i stared at it more, i noticed the flashes that were given off by the objects. perhaps, i thought, this was atmospheric hazing and poor vision, but with more and more observation, i undoubtedly saw red and green flashes at uneven intervals. i was able to nullify the effects of any light pollution by holding my jacket up to block any ground based light. it became more apparent that many of the flashes were weaving around each other, and sometimes visibly accelerating away and out of sight. the flashes were also able to make hairpin turns, and it seemed like there was a game of tag being played. i have no frame of reference to how high up the flashes were, but in regards to an extremely clear night, they seemed a little dimmer than most stars you can only see on extremely clear nights. i would speculate on there being between 5  and 9 of these flashes, and they clearly moved around a slightly brighter and slightly bigger flash. i will be clear when i say that there were red and green flashes. 
in order for others to get an idea where in the sky this was, i will attempt to describe it in a very rudimentary way. i was standing looking due east. let's say looking straight up is 12 o'clock, and looking towards the horizon is 3 o'clock... these craft were flying at barely 1 o'clock. 
i had no feelings toward seeing the craft, besides being certain that what i had seen were no stars or satellites. 
the only reason that i left the flashes was because there seemed to be no end to the maneuvers, i grew weary of straining my eyes, and i expected nothing more to happen besides the eventual cessation of activity.
content.summary: Many flashes circling and departing central star-like object.

content.detailedDescription: I've seen the plane like object at night time (so it was just lights) fly on the usual landing route, then stop in the air, get a lot brighter and turn back after about 10-15 sec. seems like a very unusual behavior for a plane. wasn't going to report it, but i saw that someone else have noticed the same event, which is the case from sea tac # 25353. the person from that case or if someone else noticed anything strange in wa can email me at [email removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Same as case # 25353

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking, looking up in the sky as i usually do to see the stars when i noticed out of nowhere a bright light that looked like a star was moving north. as i watched it moved the light dimmed darker and darker before you can barely see it and suddenly it shoot out the opposite direction and behind it on each side i noticed what seemed to be a wake like a speed boat speeding by and its wake in the water it leaves. and this seemed to happen in a matter of a few seconds. it seemed as if, whatever it was, was soaring up into the atmosphere then just sped into the stars when it reached space. i have seen strange moving lights once in a while in the sky but never one that behaved like this. the wake, if this was what it was, may have been caused as it was still in the atmosphere, to see an actual wake from an object speeding by.
content.summary: A bright light moving north in clear night sky then dimming before zooming off into space.

content.detailedDescription: The ufos have been doing arial manuvers for the past 2 nights 10pm to after 12midnight. my co-workers and i have observed the at out 10pm break and at 12 pm after work. they are south southwest of us at about a 45 deg angle in the sky.
content.summary: A trio of ufos.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down the road, close to my house. with a couple of friends. i noticed a bright light flying in the sky and pointed it out to them. as soon i i said it, something flashed about 500 ft to the left of the object. the flash only happened once. after that flash, the bright object then started to appear smaller and smaller. at this stage it seemed to be turning red. so basically, it looked as if it were going straight up, after flying horizontal for a minute or so. when it traveled over our heads that's when it appeared to fly off into space. the object did not fly off into the horizon or into the distance. i just want to be very clear of that. the object flew into space, that's my final opinion. i hope this helps. also, my friends and i can't stop talking about it. we are confused as to what could have flew into space. weird!!
content.summary: White light fly off into space, not off into the horizon or in the distance, went straight up.

content.detailedDescription: I was going out with my dog. when i saw the star like object for the first time i was getting down the stairs. the sky was clear, after the sunset. i think the object was a shining planet, like venus or mars. it was stuck in the sky. after a minute i was walking down the street, i turned back, saw again "the star" above and in few seconds it disappeard down the horizon like a teardrop. i was surprised.
content.summary: After the sunset, it was a star like object falling down.

content.detailedDescription: When i take the picture i don���t see any object, i find the object when i check yhe pictures in my laptop.
content.summary: Small disc near the cross of a church.

content.detailedDescription:
My exwifes cousin "m" and i were driving to my home in a neighborhood i was raised in called marine hills which is under the flight path of seatac airport and also has excellent views of puget sound and maury island. i am very familiar with the sight or aircraft landing. driving down a steep hill close to home i noticed a craft with an odd lighting formation. its lights were different sizes forms and placement than standard commercial jets that were very common.  it was also about half of the size of a jet.  i pointed it out to mark riding passenger. we both noticed that it was moving in the direction of other landing airplanes, but too slow for a commercial jet to stay up. i asked "what is that?"  he said he didnt know.  we were both very tense and  drove for another 60 seconds before arriving home. there was a bright moon and sparse low clouds. i thought that moving in the car or maybe wind blowing the clouds created the illusion of floating. i got out of the car and got a better view of it and is was still in the same area! we were sure it wasnt an airplane and ran afraid toward the door. to confirm again that i wasnt seeing things, i stopped at the door before going in and focused on it in relation to the coulds for about 3 more seconds when it moved in the opposite direction. it was at this point that i got the best view of the lights. unlike any aircraft i had ever seen, going up the side  was a large thick red light that showed the side angled like a pyrimid with a flat top. convinced we ran inside and marveled over what we saw. we were amazed excited and scared.   after 5 mins or so we peeked out the window and it was gone.

i have since learned that maury island is the location of the first ufo sighting in the 1940s so i thought my sighting may have more signifigance than a standard sighting so i felt i should report it.  i dont have a sketch but would like to submit one soon.  i have no pics or other physical evidence, but would love to know if air traffic control or other pilots had any other evidence or testimony.
content.summary: Me and another person saw a craft/vehicle in the seatac airport landing path at night. it hovered, then traveled in the opposite direction of landing airplanes.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving , going north on taconic, starting in millwood, weschester, starting the drive at 6am. at around the putnam/westchester border i saw a bright, star-like object shimmering in the sunrise-lit sky. it was shimmering strongly, and it was low in the sky. it seemed to bright to and to low to be a star.

due to twisting road,elevation changes, and tress, i lost sight. when returning to view (noted cloud on it's left, so knew where to look), it was gone.

in putnam now, i had a clear view of sky. it seemed to appear in middle of view, where i knew it wasn't only seconds before. it was star-like, still, but not shimmering so much. big turn took it out of view. this object was in front of a cloud.

dutchess. saw it again. it appeared when i turned a bend. it was in front of a small cloud. i saw it dim itself, hold a softer glow for a second, (or it went into the cloud), then it's light grew back to it's original brightness, then it either turned off it's light, dissapeared, or went behind the cloud. or a combination of those things.

this is now 7:47, barely an hour since.

i would like to say that i have seen similar things on this drive, always at the same time (sunrise). about 4 in 5 years.

i got home with it on my mind. i turned the tv on and it was pre-set on "investigation discovery". it was airing a mufon investigation show of a philadelphia subburb. this meant to me that i should post this sighting.

i have posted a sighting here once before.

may i say btw, that your 'timezone' question on the form is the most redundant, inefficient, and annoying thing on for anyone who has to encounter it.
content.summary: Starlight ufo in daytime, eatern-mid hudson valley, 6 to 7 am from taconic north.

content.detailedDescription:
I1)n backyard looking north, know north because of cb hobbie beam antenna bearing etc..

2)odd movment held my attention before i thought to go wake up girlfriend but could tell from their speed they would be able to be seen by her if i could get her awake and outside within the time i sometimes know there is to point out a regular satalite as she likes to watch them to , no big deal.
3)thought these lights were more than anything i/we've seen and wanted someone else to see them too. they were very high and must be at times thousands of miles away from each other yet coming back to stay around each other
40 mulitable bright and dull far away lights , very high and moving in a pack that spread way out and then back tight together rolling and zig zaging at diferent speeds as distances were collectively acounted for.
5) felt like i didn't want to be the only one to know what is there.
6) lost sight of them like one loses sight of regular satalittes as they make there way out of the suns rays except these were headed toward the north east where the sun would be coming up

looking up for regular satalights that sometime are visable in the early morning north east sky.. saw very high lights but not as high as usual satalites that appear as single slow moving common dots of light.. 
in these case there were maybe 6 or 7 lights moving and stopping then kinda taking turns 'step stoneing" in a patch of sky that was to wide of an area to be understood as something seen before..
content.summary: Multible lights (6-8) zigzaging chaseing very very high and wide formation 1000 miles between?

content.detailedDescription:
This is the actual nuforc report i filed 3 years after the sighting...I didn't want anyone to think i was crazy.  kept it to myself and my employees (4)and my family at the time. i called our local police department the next morning to see if anyone else had reported anything "strange" the past evening--they asked me to elaborate--i was very embarrassed to say ufo--i even said "...Please don't think i am crazy or anything but i saw something in the air very strange" --the officer kind of blurted a small laugh and asked me to hold...Came back and simply said "no, we had no reports of any kind like that".  i said thank you and hung up.  i corresponded with peter davenport at nuforc via email...I told him i had numerous sketches (which i do) and he asked me to forward them to him--i declined.  i don't have anything i can scan with nor did i want to take the time to do so. i was just too worried about being embarrassed as i was a local business owner.

this whole incident is still vividly etched into my memory...Every last detail.  much more than i could type into a paragraph or two. amazing. i still discuss this with my dad who is a prominent physicist and is amazed at the detail that i can relate in my accounting.

thanks for listening.
[name removed/cms/tg]





 nuforc home page
web report indexes : by event date | by location | by shape | by posting date

national ufo reporting center sighting report
occurred : 6/27/2000 22:50 (entered as : 06/27/2000 22:50)
reported: 7/10/2003 3:27:12 pm 15:27
posted: 7/16/2003
location: sewell (washington township), nj
shape: triangle
duration:1-2 minutes
observed ufo at two different times within 1-2 minutes time

as i was driving home from work that night i noticed 2 large "headlights" in the sky about 10 o'clock to my position. i was at a stoplight when i thought that it was very close to the ground (est. 500-600ft) and couldn't imagine an airplane being in such close proximity. it was at this point when i realized that it appeared to be stationary and not moving. it was approx. 1/8-1/4 mile down range and to my left as i was at the traffic light and as i continued on my way the road curves to the left and the object was now directly to my left about 9 o'clock and still 500-600 ft in the air. at this point i stopped my car in the middle of the road and rolled down the window to try and hear if it was a hovering helicopter or something. it was dead quiet and now i could see that there were two distinct red pulsing lights to the rear of this object. they pulsed slowly and intermittently. i stared at this object in utter disbelief all the while waiting for another car to come by so i could verify this with someone else. there were no other cars around. i couldn't believe it and as i continued to stare at this thing for about 30-45 seconds i know it was completely still in its position. very bright forward lights with no defraction of light, by the way, and slowly pulsing red rear lights. after this duration of time, this "thing" completely catapulted forward from its position roughly 1/4-1/2 mile away within 1/2-1 second. when it did this i had a distinct guttural vibration of some sort and it took off like that and slowed immediately. i literally screamed and took off to come home. after i made my left turn at the next light i knew i could see this object about 1/4 mile down the road and to my left because it was a clear view from there. as i passed this area i could see the red pulsing lights, still the same distance above the ground but it looked to be about 3/4 mile away and it seemed to be slowly moving in that direction (away from me). i made my right turn to enter my housing! development (300 feet away) and as i was going down this road i kept looking in my rearview mirror to see if i could see anything at all. as i was driving down this winding road, all of a sudden this "craft" of somesort appears at my 11o'clock and coming directly overhead on a slight angle so that as it passed over i would then be at my 5 o'clock position. it still seemed to be about 500-600 feet above ground and i again stopped my car in the middle of the road and rolled down my window to stick my head out to get a better view. i was literally shaking with fear and/or excitement, i guess. as it passed over me very slowly, i could make out what seemed to be underneath structure of some sort with 4 additional "lights" facing downward. because of the location of the red still pulsing lights, i had the distinct impression that it was sort of triangular in shape but more like a wedge/boomerang. it was moving very slowly and didn't make any noise at all. it was extremely quiet and it traveled out of my sightline (many trees line this street)and i raced home thinking it was going to turn around and follow me. i don't know for sure if it was the same craft as i observed prior to this, but i am convinced it was the same shape and size.
content.summary: Boomerang object, slow pulsing rear red lights, very bright forward lights no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was talking to a friend of mine on the phone and as usuall i was outside just standing on the porch looking around at the night sky as i always do not thinking much about anything more than the conversation i was having,i then noticed what i thought was a meteor shooting across the sky and i even mentioned it to the friend i was on the phone with saying oh wow i haven't seen that in a while and then what ever it was stopped almost right above me just to my left and as it did i then saw a commercial plane coming up behind it heading in the same direction going north.The trees around my house are tall so you can't see planes or meteors or stars very good unless they are directly over a certain area of my yard anyway the object what ever it was as best as i can describe it appeared to be looking for something it was moving in a way that reminded me of a draggonfly moving back and forth with incredible speed and jerky movements i didn't even think were possible for aircraft,i am still stunned by what i saw i am at a loss for words i guess but as the commercial plane began to move across the sky to the north the object which was much lower than the commercial plane shot off to the north ahead of the plane.I am not a good judge of airliner speeds or plane speeds in general but this object shot off at a speed that got it straight out of sight heading north going upwards to a higher altitude so fast my eyes had a very hard time staying with it,the only speed i can think of that compares to it would be the speed of a meteor entering the earths atmosphere as you see it shoot across the sky,i am baffled by this what the heck was it? the whole incident with the object lasted about 4 or 5 seconds but the movements and the speed just don't seem real to me there is know way a person wound be able to withstand the force of such speed or the way the thing was shooting back and forth in different directions,i'm not telling anyone about this and using my name with the story there is know way anyone would believe me heck i don't even believe me and i saw it myself i just can't get over it and i'm quite sure i will be trying to rationalize it for a while and i know i will remember it for the rest of my life.I wish i didn't even see it because i was having a normal relaxed evening until this and now i will be up for a while just running that incident over and over in my head trying to catagorize it somehow..What was it that i saw? please help me to understand it!!!!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I can't describe this in 25 words or less first of all i'm still confused as to how anything could move like that and have people inside controlling it.

content.detailedDescription: Me and about seven friends were stargazing in front of our friend's driveway during a clear starry night. the town is in the vicinity of sea-tac airport, so we saw plenty of commercial aircraft and single engine planes flying across our fov. about ten minutes in, we all observed a fast moving object flying in a straight path above the treetops. the object was gone quickly, but i was able to note that it seemed to have a dark body (ovular or teardrop in shape), with dull yellow lights emanating from the front and sides as if they were lights from an illuminated interior (which gave me the feeling it was being piloted by a crew). the object was completely silent, and appeared to fly less than 300 feet above us. though it was only in sight for a matter of seconds, we all responded in mild shock and surprise. one person suggested it could be a meteor, but given its appearance and lack of sound this seems unlikely.
content.summary: Low flying, teardrop-shaped object with points of yellow light

content.detailedDescription:
I was lying outside talking with a friend on the phone staring at the sky. i noticed it because it was moving and i'm very used to looking at the sky, satellites, stars, etc. 
when i first noticed it i had no idea what it was, only that i was fascinated with it and i immediately started telling my friend about it.
the eight or ten or so lights moved randomly but consistently among themselves, within a certain distance from a center point, and the whole unit moved across the sky.
i felt thrilled to be seeing this thing, whatever it was. i just watched it until it disappeared behind a big tree in the neighbor's yard.
content.summary: Eight or ten or so lights randomly orbited around a center and moved together southward and disappeared behind a tree.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi -

i happened to go outside to roll up the sun shade tonight; it's getting windy and it was banging against the kitchen window. i looked up at the stars, since it's been a while, and i wanted to see what constellations i could recognize. turning around, i see this very bright light staying stationary in the sky, ese from levittown, pa where i am. it's like 4 or 5 venus's in one, when it's close to the earth. 20 minutes i check again and it's still there. my brother's already asleep or i'd get his telescope.

there is no sound or movement that i can tell, since the pine tree branches are waving about. 

planes with their lights have passed near it, so it's not a plane. i never saw anything like it.

now it's 20 minutes later and it's still there.

i do believe we're not alone in the universe, and naturally, i very curious about this.
content.summary: In the ese sky, it looks like 4 venus's in one. no sound or movement.

content.detailedDescription:
Big, triangular shaped aircraft. bright white lights on the front/rear of craft(3 to 7 lights in all). traveling s/sw over paris mt. toward greenville's historic west end. 

i was co-hosting a labor-day bonfire at a friends' house. we were all in the backyard. some of us were sitting or standing facing the fire and some were sitting/standing facing away from the fire. i was tending the fire and dividing my attention between the conversations and the music that we had playing at low level. my friends' brother had walked a little ways up the hill toward the house and something caught his attention. whatever he said exactly, i don't know but he caught my attention. i looked up to the area where he was standing and could see right where he was looking. i looked and couldn't see anything moving for a split second and then i saw it tracking from right to left very quickly. i said something excitedly and began moving up the hill towards my friend while watching this object. a few people were wondering what we were yammering on about since they hadn't seen this thing. the aircraft seemed to be triangular in shape. i say this due to the position of the 3 to 7 bright white lights(one at the tip and two rear points of the craft and maybe as many as 4 on the rear edges of the craft). no reflection from the city below could be seen on the aircraft but the bright light of the craft gave it definition. now i was running toward the front yard and saw a good five to six seconds of the object  before it went past the tree-line. after making it to the front yard i saw no more of the aircraft but did see an approaching aircraft that would have been at or near the same altitude and flying toward the area the object had just departed. the object may have been as much as 2-3 miles away from my location and was maybe no higher than 1k to 2k ft. in the air. helicopters and small aircraft seem to fly in the same altitude range as this craft. while only two of us saw the craft we asked the other folks if they had seen or heard anything at all while this took place. no one else saw the object and all of us agreed that there had been no sound.

my friend agreed to send me a short account in his own words for this report. here is what he had to say:
 
"i was staring into the night sky looking for shooting stars and what i thought was a shooting star was the front light of the air craft, then i followed the rest of air craft and noticed the four lights in the rear. the aircraft was also going at a very fast speed and no engine thrust sound what so ever.The air craft was a triangle shaped with no signs of color at all."

i'm attaching two sketches of the craft. please bear in mind this is only a best representation of what we saw. the actual body shape and the number of lights could be very different. also, after discussing this event with the other witness, we both agreed we saw no sign of jets/afterburners.
content.summary: Big, fast triangular craft w/ bright white lights seen near paris mt.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were outside in my yard at 10:01 pm when i noticed the object moving out of the corner of my eye. i immediately shouted for him to turn around and look too. i saw the object for about 5-7 seconds. he saw it for about 2-3 seconds. the object was first observed at about 15 degrees above the horizon at a geopraphical heading of about 350 degrees. it was moving in a downward curving trajectory until it disappeared in a fraction of an instant at about 10 degrees above the horizon. the object appeared about as bright or detectable as jupiter rising in the east or venus which had already set in the west. the object appeared to reflect a pinkish or yellowish orange glow that may have been caused by the sun which had already passed over the horizon. the object appeared to be at a very great distance and therefore a very high altitude. it also would have been moving very fast and been quite large if it was at the extreme long range it appeared to be. my friend and i quickly noted all relative observations, time, heading, etc. we walked around the corner of the house to see jupiter, at which time we estimated the luminosity to be very simular. we could not explain what we saw. i have many reasons i do not believe this was any type of known artficial or naturally occuring object. i cannot rationalize or justify it as such. i am a knowledgeable amatuer astronomer and aviation enthuiast. i have been watching the sky almost every night for the last forty years. i have seen all manner of craft, weather anomaly, and aerial and astronomical phenomenon. what we saw was none of the above.
content.summary: Myself and an associate witnessed very distant object descend towards earth and vanish.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from a friends westbound on highway 59 in waukesha.  when i got near the intersection of highway 59 and fox river parkway i saw a black triangle traveling north by north east directly over the bridge crossing in front of me and i slammed on the brakes.  i took a right turn on to fox river parkway going north and followed it until i reached sunset drive which i took a right turn and traveled east until i reached sentry drive and took a left turn going north until it turns into college avenue going east until i reached prairie avenue and took a left and went north until i reached the intersection of prairie avenue and st paul avenue where i had to stop because it leads into a neighborhood and waukesha memorial hospital.  being between 11 and 12 on a february weeknight there were no cars while i was following the triangle at about 40mph the whole time.  there were no stoplights at these intersections in 2001 like there are today so i was able to keep up with it.  i would have definitely kept following it if the streets made it able as it was going so slow.  it was the most awesome thing i have ever seen, i was so excited that i had a hard time sleeping.  i wish i would of reported it right away so that date would be exact.  if you look at a map of waukesha you can easily find the intersection of highway 59 and fox river parkway to see the route i took.
content.summary: Black or dark gray triangle, no lights.

content.detailedDescription: First saw the circular disc hoovering above the tree top on august 16, 2010 at 10:30pm and i was watching tv and the room was dark. in direct line with my front door. the light beam was shining into my house and no light from the beam was on the lawn. watched the object for 15-20 minutes then rose straight up into the air.No noise but it created wind. on the 20th of august it appeared in the sky but much further away. several nights later it appeared again and then we saw it again this evening. this evening over the 30 minute period the object slowly decended in the sky until it was below the treetops. while i do not feel afraid i am perplexed as to what the bright light is. we live in a rural area and under a flight path of planes to and from bwi and it is not a plane.
content.summary: Bright light hoovering in sky; not plane and not a star. multiple sightings.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 1:30 am (est) on april 19, 2010 my wife and i were sitting in our small hotel room near the beach in progreso, yucatan. all of a sudden i said to her excitedly: ���we have to get to the beach. c���mon, let���s go right now!��� within minutes we had dressed and ran down to the beach across the street. (an urgent voice in my head had told me to get to the beach immediately.)

we sat on the beach and looked up at the sky, due north over the gulf of mexico. patchy cirrus clouds made it necessary to be extremely focused, as what took place often occurred at incredible speeds, infinitely faster than the fastest military aircraft. 

there were two large ships. "n" (my wife) and i estimate that they appeared about as big as football fields, but we could be way off. one ship was circular and its contours were illuminated by a rainbow array of lights. the other was triangular, and emitted what we immediately thought was a laser-like light---a glow---that was magnificent. these ships were relatively stable in the skies. although they moved in any direction at will and even appeared to change shape, what they sent into the skies was even more incredible. 

about twenty spheres were released by the ships and performed amazing feats of aeronautical engineering. they went up, stopped, went down, went left, right, changed direction. and then we were treated to something even more fantastic. one of the spheres zigzagged (like a zipper) from an altitude of about one mile and landed in the gulf of mexico, swimming distance to where we marveled on the beach. neither of us has seen faster movement by a material object. it was incredibly beautiful.

after forty-five minutes (2:15 est) we were more than overwhelmed and went back to our hotel room. interestingly, the following day we met our shaman in the pueblito of halacho near the campeche border with yucatan and he told us: ���it is good that you can see them.��� a fisherman who works at a popular restaurant in merida said: ���yes. two years ago we saw one in the same place. it landed in the water and didn���t even make a ripple.���

following this sighting, for a period of approximately three weeks, my wife and i experienced unusual phenomena (for me, life-changing). this is not the first time this has happened:

on may 30, 1998 (in los angeles) a brilliant white light appeared in my bedroom at 2:02 am. i felt myself (my mind, i guess) being drawn into the light. i have no other memory of this experience. when it was over it was 2:22 am. several weeks later a spirit-like being(female)appeared at the foot of my bed and observed my ex-wife and i. my ex-wife said to me: "get back into bed." i said: "i am." she said: "stop goofing around. i see you standing over there." i was in bed, watching the almost incorporeal being for approximately five minutes. these two experiences changed my life in a multitude of ways. also, i learned to be extremely discreet in who i discussed these matters with. almost everybody thought i was suffering from psychotic delusions. (i was 48 years old at the time with no history of mental or emotional problems).

this is the second time that "n" and i have seen ufos together. on september 9, 2003, with my son "j", we witnessed a thirty minute ���display��� in which several spacecraft were encountered by dozens of military planes in the desert skies above prescott, arizona. we reported our experience to the fbi in phoenix.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 2 large spacecraft (triangle and disc); multiple small spheres; bright multi-colored lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Two versions which i believe to be connected.

first version, which i recall as being late spring or early summer, probably between the years 1965 to 1967.  i believe it was 1965.  five years old, i sat by myself in the back yard near the alley playing with matchbox cars.  my dachshund was beside me in the late afternoon.  my dog alerted before i heard the sound of an engine above and to the south, out of view because of the house.  looking up as the sound increased, i saw a crop duster, a bi-plane, i think.  the plane swooped down from over the roof of our two-story house and continued low as it flew northward.  a cotton field was just a few hundred yards to the north, and as the crop duster (that is how i remember it-- a crop duster) went over head, deep red or blood-red pellets of various shapes and sizes fell on me and into the yard. odd, but sometimes i recall them as horse-pill shaped lozenges, sometimes as red bands up to three inches long, and sometimes as clumps of course granules. 

i watched, amazed, and my mother soon opened the kitchen door leading into the garage.  the main garage door already being open, she called out to me to come in-- somewhat alarmed.  i told her i wanted to watch the plane, but she insisted, seeming to me to be unnecessarily alarmed.  i had never seen a crop duster and we had just moved to this new home.  i cannot account for my interpretation of the object being a crop duster, nor can i understand why i have no memory of going back outside to look at the red pellets.  i so distinctly remember the pellets, but after collecting my toys and going inside, the matter seemed to be no longer of interest. 

that cotton field to the north was soon built-over by the expanding neighborhood and including spring creek elementary school which opened for my second grade year in 1967.  that school was the location of a second account supposedly involving me and told to me by the witness two or three years after the incident he recounted. 

about 1969, a classmate described what he remembered this way:  

our class was out playing on the school playground at recess in about 1967.  as he described the event, he asked if any of the several of us listening to him remembered the event (none did).  he was particular surprised that i had not remembered it, because he claimed i had gotten in trouble for ignoring the teachers' panicked calls for everyone to come inside the school, instead, he said, i and a few others went toward what he described.

he said that several students started pointing in the sky to the south of the playground and that the teachers noticed it as well. initially, the many witnesses (a school yard full of students and teachers-- probably a hundred persons) thought a small plane, like a cessna, was in trouble and trying to make a landing in the playground, so low was the craft. that might make sense given that a row of high-tension wire separated the playground from the wide, long and straight gravel road slightly to the west.

instead of it being a plane in trouble, the craft came to the southern edge of the playground no longer (if ever) appearing to have wings, and it nearly stopped to hover there.  it made a very slow pass over the playground as the teachers tried to gather the students into the building.  my friend said the teachers were panicking, but that at least some of the students were not.  then, he said some of us continued to watch the craft as numerous small metallic objects, maybe a little larger than silver dollars, dropped out of the larger craft and began to fly about over the playground.  some of these little disks were flying across the street and toward an old stock pond surrounded by trees which we called, "cobb's creek."

he seemed disturbed that no one recalled what he described and tried to prompt me to recall how i and a few others actually ran toward the craft hovering overhead and tried to find some of the small disks.  the teachers, he said, were furious with me and the others who did this--as we were the last to come inside the school.  he also said that after school, some of us went around in the "cobb's creek" wooded area looking for disks and none were found there or on the playground.

perhaps due to an unconscious connection, i perceive each story as having a duration of perhaps a little more than sixty seconds.  in neither story do i know how the craft departed.  the crop-duster i recall, disappeared from view in mere moments due my line of sight being hindered by the house across the alley, although the engine noise was audible while i remained outdoors.  my impression of my classmate's account is that his craft made no noise at all-- because engine failure was an initial assumption in his recollection.

my own analysis is that my crop duster and his story are the same.  between the dates of the two varying stories, i, inexplicably, became terrified of the part of my backyard near the alley-- worried about ufo's. for a few months, i would not go out there at night.  during that same time, many of my classmates were fascinated by stories of ufo's and i did not understand their fascination, having never heard of such things before that time.  

i admit that some traumatic experience involving me is a viable explanation for my having a very tame memory compared to my friend's oddly similar story, given my inexplicable fear of ufo's and the back yard, which i in no way connected with the crop-duster.  that i apparently had post traumatic stress disorder before a most obvious traumatic experience much later in my adult life has had me looking quite closely at these memories as well as the story told by my friend.

both craft in the two accounts were, at first appearance, taken as airplanes, both traveling from south to north and both dropping smaller items as they passed overhead.  both stories have the adult authority figure(s) standing at a door, calling out in what appeared to be unjustified concern.  both accounts have me resisting the call to come inside.

i have a master's degree in pastoral theology (counseling), and nearly two decades of counseling experience as a parish priest.  some of my earliest memories include mystical, spiritual experiences-- typical of a person whose prayer life leans toward the contemplative.  as a result, i have studied carl jung's theories including his concept that ufo accounts are often (perhaps even always) mystical visions of the post-modern culture.  

while my recollection of what may be the same event does not involve a ufo my recollection of the crop-duster is "overly vivid--" very much the sense that it was spiritual experience rather than an historical one.  that my school mate recalled it as a collective experience but having to do with alien spacecraft is most intriguing.

for precise location: spring creek elementary in far north dallas may be located via google earth.  (32d 57' 23"n 96d 46' 39"w) and the playground along meandering way is where my friend recalled the event taking place.  my own backyard experience is about 300 yards distant of that same location.  what locals always called, "cobb's lake" and "cobb's creek" is now labeled "arapaho park" directly sw of the playground.

my friend's story would be a ce1, my crop-duster i suspect would be fb4.

while preserving my anonymity publicly, a researcher may contact me via my email (which is provided separately on this form) including any requests for third party sharing which i will consider individually.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Small autonomus discs dropping from larger craft over school playground.

content.detailedDescription:
off our front porch/ yard/windows/bedroom window
 @dusk- 12a.M.
witnesses to date 10: [witnesses names moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]

 starting 8-27-2010 we observed a star like object and watched it slowly sink behind the tree line. 8-28-2010 through last night 9-7-2010 we observed the star like object and realized that the twinkling light is on  top of the triangular ship. the bottom lights are smaller and softly blink in an amber hue or antique white. the top light changes colors that rotate clockwise and in long/fast patterns. the colors are: blue,red,green,orange,yellow,white and amber.
 the ship seems to have cloaking capabilities the stars behind the mass of the ship are blotted out sometimes, then at other times the triangle seems transparent. we have started to go out side every evening just as venus begins her rise the ship descends. the descent is not always in the same location but so far the object begins the descent in our south or western sky. we are north of lake ponchatrain and wonder if the ship is coming in from over the lake.
 my dad had a friend, a professor at our local university, he lived in a camp down south of here on the lakes pass. he often said he saw craft on the lake funneling water up into its belly while hovering over the pass. we hear these stories, but it now seems possible.
 last night the ship was really close. the air was heavy with humidity we could make out the top disco type light, but the tail(wing tipped) lights were barely visible and at least a city block apart. my neighbor sandy d., said "that looks like a mother-ship." when i figured out how close the craft was i came inside and watched it out the window until it moved on @10:30 in a n/w direction. the ship stays below 1,000 ft. and is completely silent. at times it is stationary and then sometimes the craft moves so slowly it is difficult to notice the movement. please if this is happening in other locations on our planet please leave a response for us to review. thank you..........
content.summary: Top glowing red, blue, green, yellow, orange, white and amber to smaller lights at bottom of triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my backyard in poughquag ny on sunday night (09/05/10)with my wife and two friends enjoying the crstal clear night around a campfire. i had just commented on how incredibly clear the night was as i continued to gaze up into the sky and soon after i saw an orange ball with a "comet like" tail zip through the sky above the tree tops. it happened very fast maybe 2 seconds, i jumped out of my seat and ran accross the yard in an effort to follow the light as it disappeared at the tree line.

it was gone in an instant, as i came back to the fire i said "did you see that?" to my wife and friends, but they had their backs to it at the time. i described what i saw with excitement, a glowing orange luminescent ball, but they missed it. about a half hour later i asked "you did see me get up and run accross the yard right?" as i was beginning to doubt myself. they did, they saw me jump up and take off but that was all they saw. 

i knew i saw something amazing and i decided a few days later to see if anyone else had seen the same thing. i searched google for "orange ball in ny sky" and was shocked to find several similar sightings on sightings.Com on the same night as close as 25 miles away at right around the same time.One in kingston at 9:00 described several orange balls of light in the sky, sounds just like what i saw several minutes later coming from the direction of kinston, ny. the difference was i only saw one object and it was hurling through the sky.There was all kinds of air traffic in the sky that night and the speed of this thing put the jets heading into stewart airport to shame, 30-40 times the speed of those.

yet another search of google found reports and videos from all over the globe of similar orange balls of light in the sky. crazy!, but i don't expect we will be hearing anything about this on the evening news anytime soon.
content.summary: Orange ball steaks overhead on a clear ny night.

content.detailedDescription:
Object appeared about a half mile away, had sun-bright light underneath, notches around the periphery, silent. it appeared about 5 degrees wide, so at a half mile that would make it something like 210' in diameter. all of this is subjective based on my interpretation of its distance. what i have attached is not a picture, but a creation i made which looks exactly like the real object---i didn't have my camera and in the ten seconds or so it took to get it out, the object disappeared. i took a pic of where it was and created the image i saw in that picture. read my report attached to the file attached to this report.

i'll always regret not having the camera to hand, but standing at the road side taking a whiz, i didn't.
content.summary: Oval - like a balloon, silver, had a bright light underneath about a quarter as bright as the sun.

content.detailedDescription:
This was the weekend of the chicago air and water show.  the skies were bright for late afternnon and the weather was very good.  

i was at home with a broken ankle and was sitting in my den, facing west and my 83 year old mother was in the living room, next to where i was sitting.  the living room faces west also.  

it was approximately 4:30 or a little later in the afternoon when suddenly the room i was sitting in became pitch black.  i looked up and glanced out the window in front of me and it was pitch black outside also.  my first and immediate thought was that this was a ufo.  i don't know why i thought that?

suddenly, everything returned to daylight, as it was previously.  i looked at the clock, but the time was no different.  i thought perhaps my eyes were playing tricks on me, so i called into the other room and said to my mother, who was reading in there, "what was that?" i thought she would say nothing happened, but her answer confirmed my experience when she responded with, "i don't know, but the whole room just went totally black for at least two seconds."  

we talked for a few minutes as we both wondered if perhaps one of the airplanes from the air show was returning to a base and flew overhead, maybe blocking the sun.  but, neither of us heard any noise at all.  and, we could not figure out how something could be so large as to block out the sun completely and turn a bright afternoon into the middle of the night for a few seconds.

the next day, monday august 16th, a friend stopped over who lives only about 4 miles away in chicago.  i asked him if the sky had turned black and he said, "no".  there was nothing written about it in the news.

i had experienced two very significant dreams of alien contact back in the mid 1990's.  but, i don't know if anything in those dreams are real.  yet with this, both my mother and i did experience a normal afternoon turn into total darkness without any noise or someone else confirming the experience. 

again, the first thought that entered my mind for some unknown reason was ufo.
content.summary: A nice summer's afternoon turned to night for a few seconds.
